participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and resilient, Amina often reflects on her past while remaining optimistic about her future.
participant_1.background: i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states. my aunt helped me escape when i was 15. i was forced to marry when i was a teenager.

participant_2.name: Steve
participant_2.personality: Curious and laid-back, Steve enjoys exploring new ideas and values creativity in his life.
participant_2.background: i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

content.text: I am doing well. How are you?
